entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Terrace Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:54 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Bay 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -13.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -20.2°C
Wind: NNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 4 cm along the lakeshore. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
